TimelyMD has an immediate opening for a
Data Scientist
to work as an integral part of the Data Analytics and Data Science Team. You will work within a dedicated team who are endeavoring to increase data effectiveness in service of the company's mission. Within this team your primary responsibility will be developing novel approaches to problems, while the rest of the team focuses on Analytics & Engineering. The ideal candidate sees a problem and tackles it head on, and can work in a fast paced environment. This person will leverage their expertise to grow our forecasting program, utilize NLP techniques, and develop ML approaches for product and care purposes. If this sounds like you, then we encourage you to apply.What You'll DoAct as the point person for Data Science requests within the Data Analytics and Data Science team.Design and validate experiments to test models and solutionsBuild predictive models and machine-learning algorithmsProduce accurate documentation for all Data Science studies performedClearly communicate findings from Data Science projects to both technical and non-technical audiences.Utilize growing datasets to make an impact in the wellbeing of students across the countryCollaborate with our data engineer  to gather data from  various sourcesCollaborate with our data analytics team to translate findings into visualizations Collaborate with engineering and product development teams to productionalize modelsWhat You BringBachelor's Degree or higherAt least 4+ years holding Data Science positions Demonstrated experience applying data science methods to real-world data problemsKnowledge of HIPAA guidelines and how to develop within those guidelinesExceptional SQL(MySql, Postgres)/Python and(or) R; familiarity with Scala is an assetDeep understanding and experience with advanced statistics and probabilityExperience in healthcare or "digital health" environment. Ability to clearly communicate findings and model performance to a wide range of stakeholdersExperience developing within AWS Sagemaker or other cloud ML environment is beneficialBenefits & Perks13 Paid Company Holidays + No work on your birthday!Unlimited PTO + Volunteer Time Off (VTO) as an organization to give back to the communityVariable bonus eligibilityCompany-sponsored Health Insurance + Pet Insurance Company-paid group Life Insurance + Company-paid Short Term DisabilityConcierge benefit support services401(k) with employer match Free access to TimelyMD services for you and your immediate familyMission Driven Purpose with a Supportive Team Culture The salary range for this opportunity is $115,000 – $125,000 per year, depending on education and experience. This is the base pay, and you will be eligible for a discretionary bonus in addition to the base pay.
